entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 70%
